actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to amend chapter 55 of title 10, United States Code, to provide contract medical care for disabled persons divorced from active and former members of the uniformed services.

summary.text: Provides contract medical care to any person who divorces a member of the uniformed services on active duty if such person (1) suffers from a medical disability or condition for which treatment was provided under the provisions relating to medical and dental care for dependents of members of the uniformed services on active duty, and (2) such person is unable to acquire commercial medical insurance by reason such disability.

titles.title: A bill to amend chapter 55 of title 10, United States Code, to provide contract medical care for disabled persons divorced from active and former members of the uniformed services.
